mapper.insert: insert into group (group_id, captain_id, group_name, tag, `minutes`, `days`, member_number, is_private, create_date, join_score, obtain_score) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{captainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minutes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isPrivate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{joinScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{obtainScore,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update group set captain_id = #{captainId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `minutes` = #{minutes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `days` = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_number = #{memberNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_private = #{isPrivate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, join_score = #{joinScore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, obtain_score = #{obtainScore,jdbcType=INTEGER} where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select group_id, captain_id, group_name, tag, `minutes`, `days`, member_number, is_private, create_date, join_score, obtain_score from group where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
